author: shazron
msg: Modified PhoneGap app template project (added explicit SKIP_INSTALL=NO) and PhoneGapLib project (added explicit SKIP_INSTALL=YES). This is so "Build and Archive" will work properly under Xcode 4. This fix is for a bug that was fixed in Xcode 4.

author: shazron
msg: Fixed create_project.sh to handle relative path to folder to put new project in.

author: shazron
msg: Shell script to create a PhoneGap project from the command line.
